Verses: 1 pesaleyel Seeththim Maraththinaal Pettiyai Undupanninaan; Adhin Neelam Irandarai Muzhamum Adhin Agalam Ondrarai Muzhamum Adhin Uyaram Ondrarai Muzhamumaanadhu.
2 adhai Ullum Purampum Pasumpon Thagattaal Moodi, Sutrilum Adharkup Pon Thiranaiyai Undaakki,
3 adharku Naangu Pon Valaiyangalai Vaarppiththu, Avaigalai Adhin Naalu Moolaigalilum Pottu, Oru Pakkaththil Irandu Valaiyangalum Marupakkaththil Irandu Valaiyangalum Irukkumbadi Thaiththu,
4 seeththim Maraththinaal Thandugalaich Seydhu, Avaigalaip Pondhakattaal Moodi,
5 andhath Thandugalaal Pettiyaich Sumakkumbadi, Avaigalaip Pettiyin Pakkangalil Irukkum Valaiyangalile Paaichchinaan.
6 kirubaasanaththaiyum Pasumponninaal Panninaan; Adhu Irandarai Muzha Neelamum Ondrarai Muzha Agalamumaanadhu.
7 thagadaai Adikkappatta Ponninaal Irandu Kerubeengalaiyum Undaakki, Kirubaasanaththin Irandu Orangalile,
8 orupuraththu Oraththil Oru Kerubeenum, Marupuraththu Oraththil Matrak Kerubeenumaaga Andhak Kerubeengalaik Kirubaasanaththin Irandu Orangalilum Adhanode Ega Velaippaataagave Panninaan.

9 andhak Kerubeengal Thangal Settaigalai Uyara Viriththu, Thangal Settaigalaal Kirubaasanaththai Moodugiravaigalum, Ondrukkondru Edhirmugamullavaigalumaayirundhadhu; Kerubeengalin Mugangal Kirubaasanaththai Nokkik Kondirundhadhu.
10 mejaiyaiyum Seeththim Maraththaal Panninaan; Adhu Irandu Muzha Neelamum Oru Muzha Agalamum Ondrarai Muzha Uyaramumaanadhu.
11 adhaip Pasumpon Thagattaal Moodi, Sutrilum Adharkup Pon Thiranaiyai Undaakki,
12 sutrilum Adharku Naangu Virarkataiyaana Sattaththaiyum, Adhin Sattaththirkuch Sutrilum Pon Thiranaiyaiyum Undupanni,
13 adharku Naangu Ponvalaiyangalai Vaarppiththu, Avaigalai Adhin Naalukaalgalukku Irukkum Naalu Moolaigalilum Thaiththaan.
14 andha Valaiyangal Mejaiyaich Sumakkum Thandugalaip Paaichchum Idangalaayirukkumbadi Sattaththin Aruge Irundhadhu.
15 mejaiyaich Sumakkum Andhath Thandugalaich Seeththim Maraththaal Panni, Avaigalaip Pondhakattaal Moodi,

16 mejaiyin Melirukkum Paaththirangalaagiya Adhin Panimuttugalaiyum, Adhin Thattugalaiyum, Thoobakkarandigalaiyum, Adhin Paanabali Karakangalaiyum, Moodugiradharkaana Adhin Kinnangalaiyum Pasumponninaal Undaakkinaan.
17 kuththuvilakkaiyum Pasumponninaal Atippuvelaiyaai Undaakkinaan; Adhin Thandum Kilaigalum Mokkugalum Pazhangalum Pookkalum Ponninaal Seyyappattirundhadhu.
18 kuththuvilakkin Orupakkaththil Moondru Kilaigalum Adhin Marupakkaththil Moondru Kilaigalumaaga Adhin Pakkangalil Aaru Kilaigal Seyyappattadhu.
19 ovvoru Kilaiyile Vaadhumaikkottaikku Oppaana Moondru Mokkugalum Oru Pazhamum Oru Poovum Irundhadhu; Kuththuvilakkil Seyyappatta Aaru Kilaigalilum Appadiye Irundhadhu.
20 vilakkuththandil Vaadhumaik Kottaikku Oppaana Naalu Mokkugalum Pazhangalum Pookkalum Irundhadhu.

21 adhil Seyyappatta Irandu Kilaigalinkeezh Oru Pazhamum, Veru Irandu Kilaigalinkeezh Oru Pazhamum, Matra Irandu Kilaigalinkeezh Oru Pazhamum Irundhadhu; Vilakkuththandil Seyyappatta Aaru Kilaigalukkum Appadiye Irundhadhu.
22 avaigalin Pazhangalum Avaigalin Kilaigalum Pasumponninaal Ore Adippu Velaiyaaich Seyyappattadhu.
23 adhin Ezhu Agalgalaiyum, Adhin Kaththarigalaiyum, Saambal Paaththirangalaiyum Pasumponninaal Seydhaan.
24 adhaiyum Adhin Panimuttugal Yaavaiyum Oru Thaalandhu Pasumponninaal Seydhaan.

25 thoobabeedaththaiyum Seeththim Maraththinaal Undaakkinaan; Adhu Oru Muzha Neelamum Oru Muzha Agalamumaana Sadhuramum Irandu Muzha Uyaramumaai Irundhadhu; Adhin Kombugal Adhanode Egavelaippaadaayirundhadhu.
26 adhin Merpuraththaiyum, Adhin Sutruppuraththaiyum, Adhin Kombugalaiyum, Pasumpondhakattaal Moodi, Sutrilum Adharkup Pon Thiranaiyai Undupanni,
27 andhath Thiranaiyinkeezh Adhin Irandu Pakkangalil Irukkum Irandu Moolaigalilum Irandu Ponvalaiyangalaip Panni, Adhaich Sumakkum Thandugalaip Paaichchum Idangalaagath Thaiththu,
28 seeththim Maraththaal Andhath Thandugalaich Seydhu, Avaigalaip Pondhakattaal Moodinaan.
29 parisuththa Abishega Thailaththaiyum, Suththamaana Sugandhangalin Dhoobavarkkaththaiyum, Thailakkaaran Velaikku Oppaaga Undupanninaan.
